entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
